messages.title: What will Glenn and George do for our area?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secure the economic recovery to create more jobs and opportunities for local people. Cut taxes for low and middle income families.
Take the politics out of our NHS and secure free parking for patients and visitors at Rake Lane Hospital.
Provide the Energy, Hard Work, and Dynamism that we expect from our MP.
George will continue to work hard to improve the bus service in the village.
Ensure that Cullercoats Harbour is maintained as the jewel in the crown of the Borough's Coastline.

mentions.candidate: Glenn Hall and Councillor George Westwater

issues.economy: Economic recovery, create more jobs, cut taxes for low and middle income families.
issues.environment: Maintain Cullercoats Harbour as the jewel of the Borough's Coastline.
issues.health: Secure free parking for patients and visitors at Rake Lane Hospital.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Labour Councillors forced through a 24% 'pay rise' this year, whilst cutting jobs - Conservatives voted against.
